item.title: Microsoft Actually LovesÔ∏è Linux? üêß‚ù§
item.description: Any of you who use npm should have received a mail and that is the reason behind this post. Microsoft has made a lot of progress in between Steve Ballmer’s “Linux is a cancer” and Satya Nadella’s “Microsoft ‚ô• Linux” in the Open Source world. Most of what microsoft has been doing recently is very inclusive of OSS. Things from the top of my head include WSL, VS Code, GitHub, Dot Net Core, Powershell and now npm and the list is very long.
